item.title: T H I C C_C U R V E S pt. 1
item.description: I'm back with small series where I explain the math behind elliptical curve cryptography and write my own implementation in python. As usual this is nothing new or super exciting. I've recently ordered some Arduino boards and CAN-buses, so soon I will be taking a deep dive into CAN and car hacking! Making myself ready for our big move to Gothenburg :) What's an Elliptical curve then? From Wikipedia -
